lead_paragraph: Four days after he was sworn in, Mr. Carter arrived on Saturday in Afghanistan to meet with senior American and Afghan officials and make his own assessment of the security situation.

headline.main: Ashton Carter, Defense Secretary, in Afghanistan for Security Talks
